item.title: Trans Resources
item.description: General Resources These resources cover a lot of ground. They don’t focus on one thing, or they deal with more general concerns. LGBT Near Me This site helps you locate Trans and other Queer resources in your area. The National Center for Transgender Equality This site contains information on name and gender changes by state as well as other important information about rights and the navigation of various structures, such as insurance.
